General.Name: Empyrean Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Empyrean Technology Co., Ltd. develops, sells, and services electronic design automation (EDA) software. The company provides EDA tool systems for analog circuit design, RF circuit design, digital circuit design, full-process flat-panel display circuit design, wafer manufacturing, and packaging design. It also offers technology development, and foundry design enablement services. Its products and services are used in the fields of integrated circuit design, manufacturing, and packaging. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
